## HTMLDimensions.scale property

The visual viewport scale such as defined in the [MDNâ€”VisualViewport API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/VisualViewport)<!-- -->. Because this API is quite recent, we have a fallback strategy to compute scale.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scale: number;
```

## Remarks

The other values in this object are already in React Native dpi units.
